DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind , multicenter , randomize , control trial ( RCT ) evaluate efficacy single dose Autologous Protein Solution ( APS ) patient osteoarthritis ( OA ) knee fail least 1 conservative osteoarthritis ( OA ) therapy ( e.g . physiotherapy , simple analgesic , intra-articular injection ) .
DOC.brief_title: APSS-33-00 : A Multicenter , Pilot Study Autologous Protein Solution ( APS ) Knee Osteoarthritis ( OA )
DOC.detailed_description: A double-blind , multicenter , randomize , control trial ( RCT ) evaluate efficacy single dose Autologous Protein Solution ( APS ) patient Osteoarthritis ( OA ) knee fail least 1 conservative OA therapy ( e.g . physiotherapy , simple analgesic , intra-articular injection ) .
DOC.criteria: Male female ≥40 year ≤75 year . Willingness ability comply study procedure visit schedule ability follow verbal write instruction . Diagnosis knee osteoarthritis ( OA ) Grade 2 3 accord KellgrenLawrence scale Body mass index ( BMI ) ≤ 40 . Failed least 1 conservative OA therapy Signed independent ethic committee ( IEC ) approve informed consent form ( ICF ) . Intraarticular Hyaluronic ( HA ) injection within 6 month
